captions.text: Hey, I'm Kevin from Vsauce2 and you may not know it but you're producing and secreting air born chemicals and smells that signals about you.
Research points to the idea that body odor and maybe pheromones play a large role in attraction.
People are often attracted to the smell of someone with different genetic makeup. Different make up makes healthy offspring.
And studies indicate body order could even help signal sexual orientation.
So B.O. could actually be your smelly wingman helping you to find the perfect mate.
We had couples sleep in the same shirt for 4 nights removing perfumes and deodorants...
And then asked if they could pick out their partner's smell from the other contestants, and if that smell was attractive to them.
So let's check out this sort of scientific smell and attraction test.
Alright we're gonna start with number three.  This is definitely not you. This is my third grade girlfriend.

I actually feel more confident now. This one has a little BO. This one doesn't smell very much. Yeah someone is hygenic. I was confident, now I'm not so confident. I could be wrong but

title: Couples Try To Recognize Each Other's Smell
